verses.verse: And it shall come to <S%H1697>pass<s%>, when all these things are <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H1293>you<s%>, the blessing and the <S%H7045>curse<s%>, which I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7725>you<s%>, and you shall call them to <S%H3824>mind<s%> among all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, where the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has driven <S%H5080>you<s%>,

And shall <S%H7725>return<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and shall <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> according to all that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with all your <S%H5315>soul<s%>;

That then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7725>turn<s%> your <S%H7622>captivity<s%>, and have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> upon <S%H7725>you<s%>, and will return and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from all the <S%H5971>nations<s%>, where the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has scattered <S%H6327>you<s%>.

If any of your be driven <S%H5080>out<s%> unto the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> parts of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, from there will the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H3947>you<s%>, and from there will he fetch you:

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> which your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3423>possessed<s%>, and you shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3190>it<s%>; and he will do you good, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> you above your <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H4135>circumcise<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of your <S%H2233>seed<s%>, to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with all your <S%H5315>soul<s%>, that you may <S%H2416>live<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>put<s%> all these <S%H423>curses<s%> upon your <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and on them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7291>you<s%>, which persecuted you.

And you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> all his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will make you <S%H3498>plentiful<s%> in every <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>body<s%>, and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>land<s%>, for <S%H2896>good<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> over you for <S%H2896>good<s%>, as he <S%H7797>rejoiced<s%> over your <S%H1>fathers<s%>:

If you shall <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which are <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%>, and if you <S%H7725>turn<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with all your <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
For this <S%H4687>commandment<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, it is not <S%H6381>hidden<s%> from <S%H7350>you<s%>, neither is it far off.

It is not in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, that you should <S%H559>say<s%>, Who shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> for us to <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H3947>bring<s%> it unto <S%H8085>us<s%>, that we may hear <S%H6213>it<s%>, and do it?

Neither is it <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, that you should <S%H559>say<s%>, Who shall <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5676>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> for <S%H3947>us<s%>, and bring it unto <S%H8085>us<s%>, that we may hear <S%H6213>it<s%>, and do it?
But the <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7138>near<s%> unto <S%H6310>you<s%>, in your mouth, and in your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, that you may do <S%H6213>it<s%>.
<S%H7200>See<s%>, I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%>, and <S%H4194>death<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%>;

In that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, that you may <S%H2421>live<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%>: and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> where you <S%H935>go<s%> to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

But if your <S%H3824>heart<s%> turn <S%H6437>away<s%>, so that you will not <S%H8085>hear<s%>, but shall be drawn <S%H5080>away<s%>, and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and serve <S%H5647>them<s%>;

I <S%H5046>denounce<s%> unto you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that you shall <S%H6>surely<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>, and that you shall not <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> upon the <S%H127>land<s%>, where you pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

I <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H5749>record<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> against <S%H5414>you<s%>, that I have set <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H4194>death<s%>, <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and <S%H7045>cursing<s%>: therefore <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%>, that both you and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> may <S%H2421>live<s%>:

That you may <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and that you may <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and that you may <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto <S%H2416>him<s%>: for he is your life, and the <S%H753>length<s%> of your <S%H3117>days<s%>: that you may <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, to <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, to give <S%H5414>them<s%>.
